Description.Name: Dylan Crowther
Description.Details: Dylan Crowther, callsign "Havoc", is a seasoned combatant with decades of experience on the war-torn battlefields of the Inner Sphere. Hailing from a scorched world, he emerged as a formidable MechWarrior shaped by numerous conflicts. Widely regarded for his unmatched prowess and tactical brilliance, "Endgame" has earned a reputation as a living legend among mercenaries and a haunting specter among adversaries.
